wikipedia_page.main: Derek Harrison (born 9 February 1950) is an English former footballer who played in the Football League as a defender for Torquay United and Colchester United. He began his career at Leicester City, where he failed to make a league appearance but played in two League Cup games. He later represented Dawlish Town and Salisbury City.

response: * Derek Harrison (speedway rider) (born 1959), British speedway rider
* Derek Harrison (police officer) (1927–2011), British police officer
